group_1.textLeft: Nagisa…?
My, and you're here too, Kyoko?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, and how about everyone else?

group_1.textLeft: ...They're not here yet.@They should arrive soon, though.

group_1.textRight: So we're the early birds…

group_1.textLeft: Hurrying here backfired on us…

group_1.textRight: I brought a little something.

group_1.textLeft: A chocolate cake from Sugar Plum?

group_1.textRight: Yep, there's enough for everyone, so keep it@in the fridge.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Kyoko.
Seems like our chocolate party will be even@more wonderful than I expected!
Ah…
So back when we ran into each other…
…Kyoko! Why are you here?!

group_1.textRight: Hm… Well, doing somethin'.

group_1.textLeft: You were actually buying that cake…

group_1.textRight: I was getting some for everyone, including you.
That's why I didn't want to spoil where I was@buying the cake from.

group_1.textLeft: So that's what your secret was.
I brought a special present, too, but...
Apart from that, I also got something else for@everyone to share.
Oh my, what could it be?

group_1.textRight: The spoils of today's battle...@Pink chocolate coins.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, how adorable!

group_1.textRight: …The coins? Weren't you buyin' those for@yourself?

group_1.textLeft: I already took out my personal share of them.

group_1.textRight: …Figures.

group_1.textLeft: Besides, the real battle is starting tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: The chocolate hunt continues, eh.

group_1.textLeft: Chocolate hunt?

group_1.textRight: Kyoko and I have formed an alliance.
We managed to get a huge victory today, but…
This desperate scramble for chocolate sales…
Will only reach its climax tomorrow and the@following days!

group_1.textLeft: I don't really get it, but…
It seems that you two are getting along well,@and that's great.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.narration: [textBlack:…And so, despite being a day full of chaos, in the end,]@[textBlack:we got to enjoy a great chocolate party at Mami's house.]

group_1.textRight: …Hello.

group_1.textLeft: Welcome. We've been waiting for you.
Your pink chocolate coins are over here.
We greatly appreciate your generous patronage@every year.

group_1.textRight: …So, going forward, you'll be moving to this@location?
That's what I was told after I went to the store@by the station.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure it's a trip worth taking.
After all, this is for the charity event at the@hospital, correct?

group_1.textRight: …Indeed.
My friend asked me to help out once, and all@the kids were so happy.
Since then, I volunteer every year.

group_1.textLeft: What a wonderful story.
Ah… Pardon me.@I must be imposing on your time.
I assume you're off to prepare for the event?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm heading to the hospital now.
I have to hurry and hide this chocolate before@the kids can catch me in the act!

group_1.textCenter: The feeling when you peel off the wrapper...@It's just the best!
